name: DISPERSION_PER_GUN_DAMAGE
info: Value that adds to weapon dispersion per weapon damage value.

name: GUN_DISPERSION_DIVIDER
info: Value that divides total weapon dispersion. 15 means that weapons became 15 times more accurate than default.

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA
info: Sets max stamina value of the player.

name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_REGEN_RATE
info: Sets base stamina regeneration per turn of the player. May be used as an offset in stamina draining effects.

name: PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE
info: Sets base stamina burn per 100 moves of the walking player.

name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE
info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE
info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE
info: Set base fatigue rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base player healing rate per turn. Default: 0.0002

name: NPC_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn. Default: 0.0002

name: NO_FAULTS
info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.

name: MANUAL_BIONIC_INSTALLATION
info: Permits manual self-installation of bionics.

name: NO_NPC_FOOD
info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs. If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.

name: NO_VITAMINS
info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.

name: CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED
info: Enables CBM slots mechanics. If true CBM slots are enabled.

name: DISABLE_ANIMAL_CLASH
info: Disable additional spawn of large groups of monsters fighting each other on swamps.

name: MAX_HARVEST_COUNT
info: The maximum amount of produce that can be harvested from a plant.

name: DISABLE_ROBOT_RESPONSE
info: Disables robot spawning from alerts and from being wanted.

name: CRAZY
info: A boolean specifically for Crazy Cataclysm.

name: STATS_THROUGH_KILLS
info: Stats through Kills.  A mod that allows your stats to increase by killing zombies.

name: MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_ALLOWED
info: Enables fungal stalk to be spawned on infested terrain from 'PLANT' attack function.

name: FUNGUS_SPREAD_ON_FLAT_TILES_ALLOWED
info: Enables fungal infestation on FLAT tiles (indoors houses/asphalt/etc..).

name: MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BASE_RATE
info: Base rate to spawn fungal stalk from 'PLANT' attack function. Chance to spawn: 1 / (MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BASE_RATE + num_creatures_in_bubble / MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BUBBLE_CREATURES_DIVIDER)

name: MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BUBBLE_CREATURES_DIVIDER
info: Number of creatures in bubble will be divided on that number to calculate chance to spawn fungal stalk from 'PLANT' attack function. Chance to spawn: 1 / (MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BASE_RATE + num_creatures_in_bubble / MON_FUNGALOID_YOUNG_SPAWN_BUBBLE_CREATURES_DIVIDER)

name: FUNGUS_SPORE_CHANCE
info: Chance (0 to 1) to trigger spore creation on fungal_effects::fungalize method (for character; infested furniture/terrain bash; FUNGUS death function, FUNGUS_ADVANCED attack function) (note: change for FUNGUS_ADVANCED attack function will be affected by random radius change (1~2) and will proportionally decrease as FUNGUS_ADVANCED_CREATURES_THRESHOLD is passed)

name: FUNGUS_ADVANCED_CREATURES_THRESHOLD
info: If number of creatures nearby will pass this threshold - chance to spawn spore by FUNGUS_ADVANCED attack will be proportionally decreased

name: FUNGUS_SPORE_CREATURES_THRESHOLD
info: Global value that affects ability of fungal_effects::fungalize to spawn spores. If there is more creature nearby than specified value - spore will not spawn

name: INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE
info: The amount of INT which is used as base point for focus adjustments

name: INT_BASED_LEARNING_FOCUS_ADJUSTMENT
info: The amount of focus gained per each INT point above INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE

name: ALLOW_LEARNING_BOOK_RECIPES
info: Allows learning recipes by reading books.

name: BALANCED_MUTATIONS
info: Makes mutation more balanced and interesting.

name: MANA_REGEN_IS_FLAT
info: A boolean for whether mana regen is a flat rate or based on regenerating all your mana in a given number of hours

name: MANA_REGEN_HOURS_RATE
info: The integer number of hours that it should take for the player's mana to fully regenerate by default.

name: MANA_REGEN_FLAT
info: The integer flat rate for mana regen (per hour) that should be used as a baseline if enabled.

name: MAGIC_STAT_SCALING_PERCENT
info: The percentage bonus (or malus) that each point away from the base 8 should get you (i.e. 10 is 10%).

name: UNDERGROUND_TEMPERATURE_INFLUENCED_BY_SURFACE
info: If true, underground temperatures are influenced by surface weather conditions. At z=-1 (50% influence), z=-2 (25%), z<=-3 (0%, annual average only).

name: AVATAR_LEVEL_XP_COEFF
info: An integer coefficient for determining the XP thresholds for leveling up in STK and similar
